p: Our results agree with those reported by Neto et al. [ 56] and Reies et al. [ 57] that show that Euphorbia secondary metabolites were more efficient than verapamil in reverting MDR phenotypes. For this reason, we hypothesize that E. intisy EO can represent an effective and non-toxic P-gp inhibitor to reverse P-gp-mediated multidrug resistance and improve the potency of anticancer drugs.
